    simulate(Card, ParadeBoard) - Static method in class parade.models.player.bots.SmartBot
    Simulates how many cards would be "kicked" from the parade board if the specified card were played, according to parade rules.
    SmartBot - Class in parade.models.player.bots
    A smarter bot that chooses the card with the least number of kicks (removed cards) based on a simulation of the parade rules.
    SmartBot(String) - Constructor for class parade.models.player.bots.SmartBot
    Constructs a SmartBot with the specified name.
    SmarterBot - Class in parade.models.player.bots
    A more advanced bot that not only minimizes the number of kicked cards, but also considers the total score of those cards to make better decisions.
    SmarterBot(String) - Constructor for class parade.models.player.bots.SmarterBot
    Constructs a SmarterBot with the specified name.
    smarterSimulation(Card, ParadeBoard) - Method in class parade.models.player.bots.SmarterBot
    Simulates how many cards would be kicked and the total score of those cards if the given card were played.

    updateContext() - Method in class parade.gameStates.GamePlayStates.GamePlayState
    Updates the game context to reflect the type of the current gameplay state. 0 = NotFinalRoundTurnState 1 = FinalRoundTurnState 2 = GameEndState
